article_title: Zoom Now Under Investigation by at Least 2 States Over Security Complaints
article_description: Multiple state attorneys general are banding together in an investigation of teleconferencing software Zoom  whose exponential growth in the past few weeks amid the social distancing measures imposed during the covid 19 pandemic has been marred by an off putt
